example.akismet
Class AkismetClientFactory

java.lang.Object
  example.akismet.AkismetClientFactory

public class AkismetClientFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Factory to create Akismet clients.

Method Summary

          Get a new Akismet client associated with the given blog (with the API key given in the configuration.)

Method Detail

getClient

public AkismetClient getClient(java.lang.String siteUrl)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                               AkismetException
Get a new Akismet client associated with the given blog (with the API key given in the configuration.)

Parameters:
siteUrl - The front page or home URL of the instance making the request. For a blog or wiki this would be the front page. Note: Must be a full URI, including http://.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If either the API key or blog is null or invalid.
AkismetException - If failed to connect or request Akismet service.

getClient

public AkismetClient getClient(java.lang.String key,
                               java.lang.String siteUrl)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                               AkismetException
Get a new Akismet client associated with the given blog (with a different API key than the one specified.)

Parameters:
key - A separate Akismet API key, used instead of the default one.
siteUrl - The front page or home URL of the instance making the request. For a blog or wiki this would be the front page. Note: Must be a full URI, including http://.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If either the API key or blog is null or invalid.
AkismetException - If failed to connect or request Akismet service.

com.polopoly.cm.client.CMException

getMaxPermits

public int getMaxPermits()

hasAPIKey

public boolean hasAPIKey()
Checks if API key has been configured and is in use. A client may still be used without this being set, if they override the API key.

Returns:
true if it does. false if not.
